definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白膠片同時也模擬着舞臺人生。

sentences.english: Dyco's Easy Loader is designed to easily lift and load Plastic Film Rolls.
sentences.chinese: 迪柯的裝載機易於擡起和輸出塑料菲林膠片。

sentences.english: We will use high-quality float glass and high-quality film.
sentences.chinese: 我們選用優質的浮法玻璃和優質的膠片。

sentences.english: This image is then projected on the film of a streak camera .
sentences.chinese: 這個影象被投射到一個掃描攝影機的膠片上。

sentences.english: The background picture may be stock footage from a film library.
sentences.chinese: 可以從電影資料館將背景膠片借出。

sentences.english: The driller filled the grill with superb film.
sentences.chinese: 鑽孔者在烤架上填滿光線的膠片。

sentences.english: The documentary uses original stills and archive footage.
sentences.chinese: 這部紀錄片採用了原始劇照和檔案膠片。

sentences.english: You snap out the kit's green plastic pieces from a frame, just like you would for a model airplane.
sentences.chinese: 你折斷了套綠色塑膠片從幀，就像你會爲飛機模型。

sentences.english: Our blue sensitive, half speed film offers fine grain and high contrast.
sentences.chinese: 我們的感藍半速膠片提供了優良的晶粒和高對比度。

sentences.english: This image will be of 35mm film .
This invention relates to an improvement of recovering trace Ag from waste developing and printing liquor of film.
sentences.chinese: 本發明屬於膠片洗印水洗水中痕量銀回收方法的改進。

sentences.english: Film should be kept clean, dust free, and handled only by the edges.
sentences.chinese: 膠片應保持清潔，沒有灰塵，用手只能拿膠片的邊部。

sentences.english: Film should be kept clean, dust free, and handled only by the edges.
sentences.chinese: 膠片應保持清潔，沒有灰塵，用手只能拿膠片的邊部。

sentences.english: A device used to produce computer output on microfilm.
sentences.chinese: 用於產生計算機輸出縮微膠片的設備。

sentences.english: For a 1-minute film sequence with no duplication, we would need 1440 frames.
sentences.chinese: 一分鐘沒有重複的電影膠片需要1440幀。

sentences.english: Compressor, tray, X-ray cassette and film for mammography.
sentences.chinese: 用於乳腺攝影的壓迫器，托盤，暗盒和膠片。

definition: film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
Kodak (brand, US film company)/full name Eastman Kodak Company 伊士曼柯達公司|伊士曼柯达公司[Yi1 shi4 man4 Ke1 da2 Gong1 si1]
